verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> I take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in you. <S%H3467><s%> Save me from all those who pursue <S%H7291><s%> me, <S%H5337><s%> and deliver me,
lest they tear <S%H2963><s%> apart my soul <S%H5315><s%> like a lion, <S%H738><s%> ripping it in pieces, <S%H6561><s%> while there is none to deliver. <S%H5337><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> if I have done <S%H6213><s%> this, <S%H3426><s%> if there is iniquity <S%H5766><s%> in my hands, <S%H3709><s%>

if I have rewarded <S%H1580><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> to him who was at peace <S%H7999><s%> with me <S%H2502><s%> (yes, if I have delivered him who without cause <S%H7387><s%> was my adversary <S%H6887><s%>),

let the enemy <S%H341><s%> pursue <S%H7291><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> and overtake <S%H5381><s%> it; <S%H2416><s%> yes, let him tread my life down <S%H7429><s%> to the earth, <S%H776><s%> and lay <S%H7931><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%> in the dust. <S%H6083><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> in your anger. <S%H639><s%> Lift up <S%H5375><s%> yourself against the rage <S%H5678><s%> of my adversaries. <S%H6887><s%> Awake <S%H5782><s%> for me. <S%H6680><s%> You have commanded judgment. <S%H4941><s%>
Let the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the peoples <S%H3816><s%> surround <S%H5437><s%> you. <S%H7725><s%> Rule over them on high. <S%H4791><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> administers judgment <S%H1777><s%> to the peoples. <S%H5971><s%> Judge <S%H1777><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, according to my righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and to my integrity that is in me. <S%H8537><s%>

Oh let the wickedness <S%H7451><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> come to an end, <S%H1584><s%> but establish <S%H3559><s%> the righteous; <S%H6662><s%> their minds <S%H3629><s%> and hearts <S%H3826><s%> are searched <S%H974><s%> by the righteous <S%H6662><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>
My shield <S%H4043><s%> is with God, <S%H430><s%> who saves <S%H3467><s%> the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart. <S%H3820><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> is a righteous <S%H6662><s%> judge, <S%H8199><s%> yes, <S%H410><s%> a God who has indignation <S%H2194><s%> every day. <S%H3117><s%>
If a man doesn't <S%H7725><s%> relent, he will sharpen <S%H3913><s%> his sword; <S%H2719><s%> he has bent <S%H1869><s%> and strung <S%H3559><s%> his bow. <S%H7198><s%>
He has also prepared <S%H3559><s%> for himself the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of death. <S%H4194><s%> He makes <S%H6466><s%> ready his flaming <S%H1814><s%> arrows. <S%H2671><s%>
Behold, <S%H2254><s%> he travails with iniquity. <S%H205><s%> Yes, <S%H2029><s%> he has conceived mischief, <S%H5999><s%> and brought forth <S%H3205><s%> falsehood. <S%H8267><s%>
He has <S%H3738><s%> dug <S%H2658><s%> a hole, <S%H953><s%> and has fallen <S%H5307><s%> into the pit <S%H7845><s%> which he made. <S%H6466><s%>
The trouble <S%H5999><s%> he causes shall return <S%H7725><s%> to his own head. <S%H7218><s%> His violence <S%H2555><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%> on the crown of his own head. <S%H6936><s%>

I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> according to his righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and will sing praise <S%H2167><s%> to the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> Most High. <S%H5945><s%>
